channel.title: How to make my client legal
channel.description: what is the min requirements to make my client legal i plan on adding complete new models and redoing global objects reworking quest tab/task tab adding custom gameframe is there a need to completely redo the combat and prayers and skills and such?? i have more then i can chew as is since im coding by myself dont have a team yet i got someone as a "coder" but he cant seem to get any of the prev clients/servers they were 317's but i have a 639 now and he said he can only code 508-.

item.title: How to make my client legal
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

You said you were adding the 639 models. Those Jagex still owns. They can still get you on copyright for re-creating their game if you re-do all the models, and re-write all the code.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make my client legal

item.title: How to make my client legal
item.dc:creator: @holylouis holylouis
item.description:
@holylouis wrote:

evden if i scrap all their models and add my own??

Read full topic
item.source: How to make my client legal

item.title: How to make my client legal
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Considering that Jagex owns all the models/code from the client. Making it legal is impossible. They own all the rights to it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make my client legal
